qas.question: How did Kiplinger's Personal Finance Best Cities rate Houston?

Where did Forbes magazine place Houston for technological innovation?
Where did Houston place for Fortune 500 companies?
When was Houston ranked the best city for shopping?
How did Kiplinger's Personal Finance Best Cities rate Texas?

context: In 2008, Houston received <a0_0><b5_0>top ranking<b5_0/><a0_0/> on Kiplinger's Personal Finance Best Cities of <a1_0><b6_0>2008<b6_0/><a1_0/> list, which ranks cities on their local economy, employment opportunities, reasonable living costs, and quality of life. The city ranked <a2_0><b7_0>fourth<b7_0/><a2_0/> for highest increase in the local technological innovation over the preceding 15 years, according to Forbes magazine. In the same year, the city ranked <a3_0><b8_0>second<b8_0/><a3_0/> on the annual Fortune 500 list of company headquarters, first for Forbes magazine's Best Cities for College Graduates, and first on their list of Best Cities to Buy a Home. In <a4_0><b9_0>2010<b9_0/><a4_0/>, the city was rated the best city for shopping, according to Forbes.
